mapper.select: SELECT chat_id as chatId, profile1_id as profile1Id, profile2_id as profile2Id, status as status, tx_id as txId, tx_host as txHost, tx_user as txUserId, tx_date as txDate, tx_update as txUpdate FROM chat WHERE chat_id = #{chatId}
SELECT c.chat_id as chatId, u.name as profile2UserName FROM chat c, profile p, user u WHERE c.chat_id = #{chatId} and c.profile2_id = p.profile_id and p.user_id = u.user_id
